system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 8 (barrier of pure force + medium range)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 3 (duration 10 minutes)  
**Range:** Medium, 60 ft. (80 feet long OR hemisphere/sphere 10 feet diameter)  
**Duration:** 10 minutes  
**Total Cost:** 11 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create invisible wall of force at medium range up to 80 feet long, 20 feet high, 1 foot thick (or hemisphere 10 feet diameter, or sphere 10 feet diameter). Totally blocks physical and magical effects. Can't be dispelled but Disintegrate destroys it. Nothing can pass through.  
**Saving Throw:** None (creates barrier)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 8 hours

---
